welcome.title: Send, Receive & Manage your {network} tokens
welcome.body: Firefly is the official wallet software for {network}.

legal.title: Privacy Policy & Terms of Service
legal.body: Please review the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
legal.checkbox: I've read and I accept the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service

chooseProtocol.title: Choose protocol
chooseProtocol.body: Set the protocol for your profile.

chooseNetwork.title: Choose network
chooseNetwork.body: Set the network for your profile.

custom.title: Custom network
custom.body: Support for custom networks and/or nodes

setupCustomNetwork.title: Connect to a custom network or node
setupCustomNetwork.body: Fill the form with the node information and connect to a custom network or node.

setup.title: Set up {network, select, IOTA {an} Shimmer {a} Testnet {a} other {a}} {network} profile
setup.body: Select the appropriate method to set up your {network} profile.

setupNew.title: Create a profile
setupNew.body: You can choose a regular software wallet, or if you have a Ledger device, you can set up a hardware wallet.

softwareAccount.title: Create a software profile
softwareAccount.description: Provides a Stronghold file and recovery phrase

ledgerAccount.title: Create a hardware profile
ledgerAccount.description: Ledger Nano S, Nano S Plus or Nano X required

setupRecovered.title: Recover {network} profile
setupRecovered.body: If you have an existing mnemonic or Stronghold backup file, you can import it here.
setupRecovered.importLedgerDescription: Restore from your Ledger Nano S, Nano S Plus or X device

setupClaimed.title: Claim Shimmer staking rewards
setupClaimed.body: Import your IOTA profile and claim your Shimmer staking rewards.

enterName.title: Create your {network} profile
enterName.body1: You can create multiple user profiles to organise your wallets and improve privacy.

body2.first: For now, let's start with your first profile name.
body2.nonFirst: For now, let's start with your profile name.

enterName.addMore: You can add more profiles later.

setupStrongholdPassword.title: Create a password
setupStrongholdPassword.body1: You need a strong password to protect your funds. Use a combination of words, and avoid common phrases, names or dates.
setupStrongholdPassword.body2: It is recommended that you write down your password in your Recovery Kit.

setupPinProtection.title: Set up PIN code
setupPinProtection.body1: Enter a 6-digit PIN below. You will be asked for your PIN to access your profile.

backupMnemonic.title: Back up your recovery phrase
backupMnemonic.body1: You will now be shown a recovery phrase. Write it down in your Recovery Kit.
backupMnemonic.body2: Do not share your recovery phrase with anyone. It can be used to access your tokens from anywhere.
backupMnemonic.body3: If you lose your recovery phrase, you may lose your funds.

viewMnemonic.title: Recovery phrase
viewMnemonic.body1: In your Recovery Kit, write down the words in the exact order shown.
viewMnemonic.body2: Keep this private and safely stored.
viewMnemonic.body3: It is important to have a written backup. Computers often fail and files can corrupt.

verifyMnemonic.title: Verify recovery phrase
verifyMnemonic.body: Let's check you wrote down the phrase correctly. Please select each word in numbered order. Tip: You can press the number next to the word in your keyboard to select it.
verifyMnemonic.verifiedBody: Remember to keep it private and safely stored.

backupStronghold.title: Back up to a Stronghold file
backupStronghold.body1: Enter your password to create a Stronghold backup of your profile. Your password is used to encrypt the backup file.
backupStronghold.body2: Reasons why digital backups are important:
backupStronghold.reason1: Easily recover your wallets without typing in your recovery phrase
backupStronghold.reason2: Import your wallets on other devices

importMnemonicPhrase.title: Enter your recovery phrase
importMnemonicPhrase.body: A recovery phrase is 24 words long, all lower case, with spaces between. This is used to recover existing Firefly profiles.

importStrongholdBackup.title: Import your Stronghold backup
importStrongholdBackup.body: Import a Stronghold backup file to restore your profile.

backupPassword.body2: This is the password you set when you first created your backup.

success.title: You have successfully recovered your backup
success.body: You can now set up your new profile.

claimRewards.title: Your Shimmer staking rewards
claimRewards.body: Check that your Shimmer staking rewards are correct. You may need to search multiple times to find your full balance.

success.title: Shimmer claimed
success.body: You have successfully claimed your Shimmer tokens.

congratulations.title: Profile setup almost complete...
congratulations.body: Your new profile will be ready once the dashboard has successfully loaded.
congratulations.ledgerHint: Do not disconnect your Ledger device until the dashboard has finished loading.
congratulations.softwareMigratedBody: You have successfully migrated your funds to the new network
congratulations.fireflyLedgerBody: Your Ledger profile was successfully recovered and you can now continue.
congratulations.trinityLedgerBody: You have successfully migrated your Ledger to the new network.
congratulations.exportMigration: Export migration log and finish setup

ledgerInstallationGuide.title: Have you installed the {network} app on your Ledger device?
ledgerInstallationGuide.body1: Before you proceed, you must use Ledger Live to find and install the {network} app.
ledgerInstallationGuide.body2: Make sure your Ledger firmware is up-to-date. Any pre-installed apps should be updated to their latest versions.

importFromLedger.title: Restore or Migrate your Ledger
importFromLedger.body: Restore an existing Firefly Ledger profile, or migrate your funds from Trinity.
importFromLedger.haveFireflyLedger: I have a Firefly Ledger backup
importFromLedger.haveTrinityLedger: I have a Trinity Ledger backup

connectLedger.title: Connect your Ledger to Firefly
connectLedger.body: For your Ledger device to be found by Firefly, please ensure that the official Ledger Live application is closed.
connectLedger.unlock: Unlock your Ledger with its pin
connectLedger.openApp: Open the {network} app on your Ledger
connectLedger.tips: Tips if your Ledger isn’t connecting

restoreFromFireflyLedger.title: Restore Your Ledger Profile
restoreFromFireflyLedger.body: Press restore to complete the setup process and restore your wallets, balances and transaction history.

legacyLedgerIntro.title: Start your Ledger migration using Firefly
legacyLedgerIntro.body1: Firefly will help you to transfer your tokens to the new Chrysalis network.
legacyLedgerIntro.body2: After the migration, you will be able to send and receive your tokens using your Ledger with Firefly.
legacyLedgerIntro.readMore: What to expect from the migration process

generateNewLedgerAddress.title: Generate new address
generateNewLedgerAddress.body: You need to generate a new address to migrate your tokens with Firefly. Click the button below to continue.
generateNewLedgerAddress.confirmBody: For security, please compare the address generated on your Ledger device with the one displayed below. If they match, press both buttons on your Ledger as prompted.
generateNewLedgerAddress.confirmedBody: You have confirmed that the address in Firefly matches the one on your Ledger device.

switchLedgerApps.title: Switch Ledger apps
switchLedgerApps.body: Please switch to the {legacy} app on your Ledger device to continue migration. When ready, press continue.

general.title: General
general.description: Configure your app's appearance and other general settings

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Change your profile name or set an avatar

security.title: Security
security.description: Change your password and adjust security-related settings

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: Tools and manual settings for technical users

helpAndInfo.title: Help & Information
helpAndInfo.description: Find the answer to a question or get help with an issue

theme.title: Theme
theme.advice: If you change your system theme, you may need to restart Firefly to see the effects

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: Adjusts balance conversion and updates chart options

networkStatus.title: Network status
networkStatus.description: Displays the status of the node you are currently connected to

exportStronghold.title: Export backup
exportStronghold.description: Export to a Stronghold file - a complete encrypted backup of your wallets and latest transaction history

appLock.title: Automatic logout
appLock.description: Inactivity time before your wallets lock and you are logged out

strongholdPasswordTimeout.title: Stronghold Timeout
strongholdPasswordTimeout.description: Length of time before your Stronghold password is required again

maxMediaSize.title: Maximum media size
maxMediaSize.description: NFT media with sizes greater than this limit will not be downloaded and a placeholder representing the media type will be displayed instead

maxMediaDownloadTime.title: Maximum download time
maxMediaDownloadTime.description: NFT media which take longer than this limit to download will be canceled and a placeholder representing the media type will be displayed instead

refreshNftMedia.title: Refresh NFT media
refreshNftMedia.description: NFT media cached for this wallet will be deleted and then downloaded again

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.description: Your password is used to secure your wallets. You must use a strong password to protect your funds

changePincode.title: Change PIN code
changePincode.description: Your PIN keeps your balance and transactions private

balanceFinder.title: Balance finder
balanceFinder.description: Perform an extended search of your balance

hiddenWallets.title: Hidden wallets
hiddenWallets.description: Selecting this options will show wallets that were previously hidden

deleteProfile.title: Delete profile
deleteProfile.description: Deletes your entire profile, wallets and transaction history. Make sure you have a backup

deepLinks.title: Deep links
deepLinks.description: Automatically fill transaction data in Firefly upon clicking a deep link starting with {appProtocol}://

configureNodeList.title: Node configuration
configureNodeList.description: Manage the list of nodes you connect to
configureNodeList.noNodes: There are no nodes, unable to connect to the network
configureNodeList.noNodesAuto: There are no nodes, automatic selection will be used instead

errorLog.title: Error log
errorLog.description: View errors to debug an issue

crashReporting.title: Crash reports
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Firefly by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs
crashReporting.advice: Please restart the Firefly application to {sendCrashReports, select, true {start sharing crash reports} false {stop sharing crash reports} other {apply this change}}

troubleshoot.title: Troubleshoot
troubleshoot.description: Use the troubleshooting wizard to solve common problems

documentation.title: Documentation
documentation.description: View the documentation for in depth explanations of how things work

faq.title: FAQ
faq.description: View the FAQs to get help with a common problem or question

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Get help from the IOTA community on Discord

reportAnIssue.title: Report an issue
reportAnIssue.description: Report a bug to the developers. Check through to make sure it hasn't already been reported

developerToggle.title: Developer Mode
developerToggle.description: Switch developer mode on to enable more features in experimental state

login.pleaseWait: Please wait {time, plural, one {# second} other {# seconds}}
login.incorrectAttempts: {attempts, plural, one {# incorrect attempt} other {# incorrect attempts}}
login.hintStronghold: Your Stronghold's version is out of date. Please log in to update your Stronghold.

statuses.appNotOpen: Ledger unlocked but app not open

bodies.upcoming: Stake your {token} tokens to automatically receive rewards every 10 seconds once staking starts on {date}.
bodies.commencing: Stake your {token} tokens to automatically receive rewards every 10 seconds once staking starts on {date}.
bodies.holdingAndStaking: You automatically receive rewards every 10 seconds.
bodies.holdingAndNotStaking: Stake your {token} tokens to receive rewards every 10 seconds.
bodies.endedAndDidStake: {token} rewards will be distributed to your wallet once the network launches.
bodies.endedAndDidNotStake: You did not participate in this airdrop.
bodies.endedAndDidNotReachMinRewards: You did not stake enough {token} tokens to reach the minimum airdrop rewards.
bodies.inactive: Open network configuration in the advanced settings and make sure the current node has the "Participation" feature by clicking "View info".

assembly.name: Assembly
assembly.description: Assembly is a permissionless, highly scalable multi-chain network to build and deploy composable smart contracts. Assembly is the future of web3.

shimmer.name: Shimmer
shimmer.description: The incentivized staging network to advance major innovations on IOTA. Whatever happens, happens. How Shimmer evolves is up to you.

gallery.title: Collectibles
gallery.emptyDescription: Deposit or Receive your first collectible now!

details.storageDepositDescription: A refundable deposit required to store your NFT on the Tangle.

proposals.title: Proposals
proposals.successAddAll: {numberOfProposals, select, one {Proposal} other {Proposals}} successfully added to all wallets

details.hintVote: You can not vote on a proposal that is in the announcement phase, voting will open in {time}.

update.title: Update Stronghold
update.loginBody: Your Stronghold's version is out of date. Provide your password to update Stronghold.
update.recoveryBody: The imported Stronghold’s version is out of date, to continue we will need to update the stronghold to the latest version.

updateBackup.loginBody: It's all good now - you're running the latest Stronghold version
updateBackup.recoveryTitle: Stronghold is successfully recovered and updated
updateBackup.recoveryBody: You can now continue setting up your wallet
updateBackup.hint: We highly recommend to delete all previous Stronghold backup files and save a new one

changePassword.hint: Your Stronghold was out of date and has been updated. We recommend that you change your Stronghold password.

infoTooltip.title: Vesting of tokens
infoTooltip.body: From the tokens users received through an IOTA token airdrop, 10% are being available to users immediately at the genesis of the IOTA Stardust network. The rest is gradually unlocked over the course of two years in equal proportion happening every two weeks.

view.title: One-time deposit
view.subtitle: 3$ - 15$ recommended
view.body: Send enough funds to using your one-time address so the account can be generated with low waiting times. The funds are your to use after the account has been created.

hiddenAddress.description: Do not send funds to the address more than once

oneTimeAddress.title: One-time Address
oneTimeAddress.tip: Do not sent fund to this address more than once

walletAddress.description: Send funds to your wallet address to speed up the Mana generation

details.mainAccountNegativeBICHint: Your main account has a negative Block Issuance Credit (BIC). Please select another account as the main one.
details.accountNegativeBICHint: This account has a negative Block Issuance Credit (BIC).

accountManagement.notification: Activate one account to access the dashboard.
accountManagement.emptyAccounts: There are no accounts to show, activate one first.

table.emptyData: There is no delegation info, press the Delegate button to create your first delegation

infoTooltip.title: Delegate Funds
infoTooltip.body: Earn Mana rewards by delegating your funds to a validator.

vestingCollect.title: Collect
vestingCollect.body: Don't miss out on your unclaimed funds! Click the button below to check and claim your funds now.

metricSystemInfo.title: Transitioning from metric prefixes
metricSystemInfo.body1: At the inception of IOTA, we intended to adhere to standards by using metric system prefixes. However, indicating a multiple or submultiple of the unit has been proven impractical.
metricSystemInfo.body2: Instead of kilo (KIOTA), mega (MIOTA), etc, the new smallest unit in IOTA is called 'micro', or 'micros' for multiple units. What was previously 1 MIOTA will now simply be called one IOTA. 1,000,000 micros equal 1 IOTA.
metricSystemInfo.body3: Please be assured that this change will not affect the value of your assets - it's a linguistic refinement, not a functional change. You can find more information in the blog post announcing the change.
metricSystemInfo.link: New IOTA token denomination: moving away from metric unit prefixes

enableLedgerBlindSigning.title: Enable Blind Signing
enableLedgerBlindSigning.info: In order to confirm this transaction you need to enable Blind Signing on your ledger device.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_1: Connect and unlock your Ledger Device
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_3: Press the right button to navigate to Settings. Then press both buttons to validate. Your Ledger device displays Blind Signing.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_4: Press both buttons to enable transaction blind signing. The device displays Enabled. You're done.

locked.title: Locked
locked.subtitle: Temporarily locked in delegation or pending accounts

storageDeposit.title: Storage deposit
storageDeposit.subtitle: These funds are reserved for storing native assets.

foundryOutputs.title: Foundries
foundryOutputs.subtitle: Reserved for Native Token Foundry storage

storageDepositReturn.title: SDRUC
storageDepositReturn.subtitle: Temporarily locked in Storage Deposit Return

vesting.title: Vesting
vesting.subtitle: Locked funds awaiting unlock based on the vesting schedule

implicitAccountsMana.title: Pending Accounts Mana
implicitAccountsMana.subtitle: Pending Account mana is locked until the account is activated

availableMana.title: Available Mana
availableMana.subtitle: Mana available to send and issue blocks

minimizeStorageDeposit.title: Minimize storage deposit
minimizeStorageDeposit.description: Consolidate outputs to minimize your required storage deposit and increase your available balance.

password.title: Password required
password.subtitle: Please provide your password to unlock your wallets
password.backup: Please enter your password to export a backup

appUpdate.title: Check for updates
appUpdate.updatesDisabled: There are updates available, but in-app upgrade is disabled for your operating system.
appUpdate.latestInstalled: You are running the latest and safest version

backupStronghold.title: Backup your stronghold file
backupStronghold.body: It is important to back up your wallet regularly to ensure you have a copy of your wallets and transaction history. If you lose your backup and recovery phrase you will lose access to your funds.

deeplinkWalletSwitch.title: Select a wallet
deeplinkWalletSwitch.body: You just followed a deep link. Please select the wallet with which you want to continue.

deeplinkError.title: Failed link
deeplinkError.body: This link failed or is invalid. Please try again or double check the source of the link.

externalUrl.title: Open URL in Browser
externalUrl.body: Are you sure you want to open "{url}" in the browser?
externalUrl.hint: This URL is unknown to Firefly. Please double check the URL before opening it.
externalUrl.invalidProtocol: Cannot open URL with invalid protocol

excludeNode.title: Exclude node
excludeNode.body: Are you sure you want to exclude {url} from the available node pool?

unsetAsPrimaryNode.title: Clear primary node
unsetAsPrimaryNode.body: Are you sure you want to clear {url} as the primary node?

node.removeConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this node?

deleteProfile.title: Delete profile
deleteProfile.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? This operation cannot be undone.

transaction.title: Send asset
transaction.surplusIncluded: This transaction contains a surplus amount. Please double check this is the amount you want to send.
transaction.negativeBIC: Unable to issue a block. Your account has a negative Block Issuance Credit (BIC).

balanceFinder.title: Balance finder
balanceFinder.body: Perform a more exhaustive search of balances.
balanceFinder.searchAgainHint: Is your balance or number of wallets incorrect? Search again until your full balance is shown.
balanceFinder.currentWallet: Search only in the current wallet

balanceOverview.title: Balance overview
balanceOverview.body: Find information about all your wallets and the balance of each.

vestingRewards.title: Find vesting rewards
vestingRewards.body: Perform a more exhaustive search of your rewards.
vestingRewards.searchAgainHint: Are your vesting rewards incorrect? Search again until all your rewards are shown.

riskFunds.title: Warning: funds at risk during migration
riskFunds.body1: It is strongly recommended that you secure all your funds before proceeding with migration. Your funds are at risk of theft if you do not secure them.
riskFunds.body2: It is recommended that you rerun the process for addresses with a medium risk level or above.

missingBundle.title: Warning: funds at risk during migration
missingBundle.body: You have funds on spent addresses, but the information needed to secure them was not found. This can happen if you made transactions a long time ago. You can proceed but {value} are at risk during migration.

snapshot.title: Ongoing network upgrade
snapshot.body: The Chrysalis network upgrade has begun.
snapshot.bodyMigration: Migration is disabled until it is complete.
snapshot.bodyFirefly: Firefly is disabled until it is complete. Token migration will still be possible afterwards.

ledgerNotConnected.title: Connect your Ledger
ledgerNotConnected.notConnected: Connect your Ledger device to continue.
ledgerNotConnected.locked: Unlock your Ledger device to continue.
ledgerNotConnected.appNotOpen: Open the {legacy} app on your Ledger device to continue.

ledgerConfirmation.confirm: To proceed, confirm the prompt displayed on your Ledger device

steps.0: Install and open the Ledger Live application
steps.1: Ensure that your Ledger is connected
steps.2: Search for the {legacy} app. You may need to enable Ledger Live developer mode.
steps.4: Remember that it's important to close Ledger Live before returning to Firefly

ledgerConnectionGuide.title: Tips if your Ledger isn’t connecting

steps.0: Make sure Ledger Live is not open on your computer
steps.1: Ensure you have unlocked your Ledger device with your PIN
steps.2: Open the new {network} app on your Ledger device

3.link: Try the official Ledger support page

verifyLedgerTransaction.title: Verify transaction
verifyLedgerTransaction.info: Compare and confirm the transaction information displayed on your ledger device against the information below.

verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.title: Verify internal transaction
verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.info: Please confirm the internal transaction on your ledger.
verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.hint: All assets will remain on your wallet when sending an internal transaction.

verifyLedgerBlock.title: Verify block
verifyLedgerBlock.info: Compare and confirm the block information displayed on your ledger device against the information below.

ledgerAddress.title: Confirm receive address
ledgerAddress.body: Confirm that the receive address displayed on your Ledger matches the one displayed below. If they match, press both buttons on your Ledger as prompted.

stakingConfirmation.title: Confirm Participation
stakingConfirmation.multiAirdropWarning: If you do not want to participate in both airdrops, you can opt-out below. You can unstake and restake to opt back in at any time.
stakingConfirmation.mergeStakeWarning: Your funds will be staked for {airdrop}. To change which airdrops you want to participate in, unstake this wallet and stake it again.

newStakingPeriodNotification.title: Staking phase {periodNumber} from {date}
newStakingPeriodNotification.body: IOTA staking for Assembly continues... Participate in phase {periodNumber} for 90 days. Stake your IOTA tokens and earn ASMB rewards!
newStakingPeriodNotification.info: Shimmer staking is now complete and only ASMB tokens will be distributed.

shimmer-info.title: About Shimmer
shimmer-info.body1: Congratulations you have earned SMR tokens as a staking reward. Shimmer is an incentivized staging network to test major upgrades on IOTA.
shimmer-info.body2: We aim to launch Shimmer in 2022. Your tokens will become available to transfer once the network launches.

assembly-info.title: About Assembly
assembly-info.body1: Congratulations you have earned ASMB tokens as a staking reward. Assembly is a multi-chain network for deploying scalable smart contracts on IOTA.
assembly-info.body2: We aim to launch Assembly in 2022. Your tokens will become available to transfer once the network launches.

confirmDeveloperProfile.title: You are creating a developer profile
confirmDeveloperProfile.body: You will be connected to the Chrysalis Devnet by default, and can switch networks manually. Only continue if you know what you are doing.

crashReporting.title: Crash reporting
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Firefly by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs. If selected, this will take effect after restarting Firefly.
crashReporting.checkbox: Send crash reports to the IOTA Foundation

legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyBody: We have updated Firefly's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
legalUpdate.tosBody: We have updated Firefly's Terms of Service.
legalUpdate.privPolicyBody: We have updated Firefly's Privacy Policy.
legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
legalUpdate.tosCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Terms of Service
legalUpdate.privPolicyCheckbox: I've read and I accept the updated Privacy Policy

tokenInformation.verificationWarning: This token is unverified. Compare the token metadata against the relevant team’s official website. Only verify tokens that you trust.

noAccountOuput.title: Unable to mint
noAccountOuput.description: You must own an account output to mint native tokens. To continue, please create an account first

errors.invalidMimetype: Invalid MimeType, check if the file type is supported
errors.quantityTooSmall: Quantity needs to be greater than 0
errors.quantityTooLarge: Quantity needs to be smaller than 64
errors.invalidURI: Invalid URI, please provide a valid URI
errors.notReachable: URI not reachable, unable to check NFT type
errors.royaltiesMustBeJSON: Royalties must be a valid JSON
errors.invalidAddress: Invalid address, must be a valid {networkHrp} address where royalties will be sent to
errors.invalidRoyaltyValue: Invalid value, it must be a numeric decimal representative of the percentage required ie. 0.05
errors.invalidRoyaltyValueSum: Invalid value, the sum of all royalties must be less than or equal to 1'
errors.attributesMustBeJSON: Attributes must be a valid JSON
errors.attributesMustBeArrayOfObjects: Attributes must be an array of objects
errors.attributesInvalidKeys: Invalid key, attributes must have the keys "trait_type" and "value"
errors.attributesInvalidValues: Invalid value, "trait_type" must be a non empty string and "value" must be a non empty string or a number

faucetRequest.title: Faucet request
faucetRequest.body: Are you sure you want to request {token} tokens from the {network} faucet?

allotMana.title: Allot Mana
allotMana.body: Select the account address to allot mana.

manageVotingPower.title: Manage voting power
manageVotingPower.body: Define your voting power to vote on proposals.
manageVotingPower.hint: All funds that you allocate to voting are locked. In order to make them spendable again, you need to decrease your voting power. This affects all proposals with an active vote.
manageVotingPower.amountZero: Please be aware that setting your voting power to zero will stop all your votes for all proposals you are currently voting on.

addProposal.title: Add proposal
addProposal.body: Please provide the information listed below to add a proposal.
addProposal.addToAllWallets: Add the proposal to all wallets

editProposal.title: Edit proposal
editProposal.body: Please provide the new url for the node that contains this proposal.

voteForProposal.title: Vote for proposal
voteForProposal.body: You're about to vote for {proposal} proposal.
voteForProposal.hasAbstained: You are abstaining from answering {numberOfQuestions, plural, one {# question} other {# questions}}.
voteForProposal.noVotingPower: You do not have any voting power. Please increase your voting power from the Governance dashboard.

revote.title: Revote on proposals
revote.body: Changing your voting power temporarily stops your votes for all proposals from being counted. Simply click "Revote" to resume voting.
revote.hint: Firefly remembers all of the proposals and answer options you previously voted for.

removeProposal.title: Remove proposal
removeProposal.body: Are you sure you want to remove this proposal?
removeProposal.hint: Please note that removing a proposal during the counting period will stop your votes but won't impact any votes that have already been counted.

stopVoting.title: Stop voting
stopVoting.body: You're about to stop voting for the {proposalName} proposal.
stopVoting.hint: Please note that stopping voting during the counting period won't impact any votes that have already been counted.

nodeAuthRequired.title: Authentication required
nodeAuthRequired.body: This node requires additional authentication. Please fill in the appropriate information.

withdrawFromL2.title: Withdraw from L2
withdrawFromL2.body: List of addresses with withdrawable funds

createDelegation.title: Create Delegation
createDelegation.body: Set the amount and the account of the validator

implicitAccountAddress.title: Create Account
implicitAccountAddress.subtitle: Send funds to this address to start the acount creation process. We recommend sending 3$ - 15$.

confirmIgnore.title: Ignore transaction
confirmIgnore.description: Are you sure you want to ignore this transaction?
confirmIgnore.node: Please note that ignoring a transaction only hides it from your Activity feed

confirmTokenBurn.title: Burn {assetName}
confirmTokenBurn.hint: Please note that burning a token may free storage deposit attached to it and is not reversible

confirmNftBurn.title: Burn {nftName}
confirmNftBurn.description: Are you sure you want to burn this NFT?
confirmNftBurn.hint: Please note that burning an NFT frees the storage deposit attached to it and is not reversible.

restoreWalletDescription.iotaAlphanet: Restore an existing IOTA Alphanet profile
restoreWalletDescription.custom: Restore an existing Custom Network profile

refreshNftMedia.title: Refresh NFT media
refreshNftMedia.description: Do you want to delete and re-download all NFT media for this wallet?

actions.createWalletDescription: Create a fresh profile running on {network, select, iota {Chrysalis} shimmer {Shimmer} testnet {Testnet} custom {Custom Network} other {Unknown}}
actions.claimShimmerDescription: Import IOTA profile and claim staking rewards
actions.iveWrittenRecoveryPhrase: I’ve written down my recovery phrase

general.scanQrOrPaste: Scan a QR code or paste an Address
general.firstSync: Syncing history, this may take a while...
general.availableBalanceTooltip: An asset's total balance minus any funds that are required to cover the storage deposit (i.e. funds that are locked in pending transactions, reserved for Native Tokens, or reserved for NFTs).
general.name: Name
general.mintNativeTokenDescription: Mint native token following IRC30 standard
general.refreshTokenMetadataDescription: Reset and refresh all token metadata
general.refreshTokenMetadataHint: This will reset all your tokens' metadata including the verification status and unhide any hidden assets.
general.testDeepLinkDescription: Simulate a deep link request sent to firefly
general.verifyLedgerDepositAddress: Please check the ledger device and verify that the deposit address matches the one displayed on the ledger device

tooltips.optionalInput: This optional data will be public on the explorer and viewable by everyone.

minting.storageDeposit: A refundable token deposit needed to store your transaction on the Tangle.
minting.giftedStorageDeposit: The storage deposit for this transaction was gifted to you. You do not need to refund the deposit.
minting.expirationTime: Claim these funds before the expiration time or they will be returned to the sender.
minting.timelockDate: The sender set a timelock on these funds. You will be able to spend them once the timelock expires.
minting.metadata: An optional data field for storing data persistently on the Tangle.
minting.tag: A short optional data field. Tagging groups of transactions can make them easier to search for.

incoming.storageDeposit: A refundable token deposit needed to store your transaction on the Tangle.
incoming.giftedStorageDeposit: The storage deposit for this transaction was gifted to you. You do not need to refund the deposit.
incoming.expirationTime: Claim these funds before the expiration time or they will be returned to the sender.
incoming.timelockDate: The sender set a timelock on these funds. You will be able to spend them once the timelock expires.
incoming.metadata: An optional data field for storing data persistently on the Tangle.
incoming.tag: A short optional data field. Tagging groups of transactions can make them easier to search for.
incoming.gasFee: Gas fee is required to conduct a transaction or execute a smart contract function on Shimmer EVM.

outgoing.storageDeposit: A storage deposit is a refundable deposit needed to store your transaction on the Tangle.
outgoing.giftedStorageDeposit: The recipient does not need to refund the deposit.
outgoing.expirationTime: If the recipient does not claim in time your tokens will be returned to you.
outgoing.timelockDate: You added a timelock to this transaction. The recipient will not be able to spend these funds until the timelock expires.
outgoing.metadata: An optional data field for storing data persistently on the Tangle.
outgoing.tag: A short optional data field. Tagging groups of transactions can make them easier to search for.
outgoing.gasFee: Gas fee is required to conduct a transaction or execute a smart contract function on Shimmer EVM.

nftMetadata.type: The MimeType of the NFT. e.g. image/png.
nftMetadata.collectionId: UTXO string of the collection NFT that minted this NFT
nftMetadata.royalties: An object containing key-value pairs of addresses that map to payout percentages
nftMetadata.attributes: An array of traits and values that define attributes of the NFT

mintNativeToken.decimals: IRC30 optional parameter: Number of decimals the token uses (divide the token amount by 10^decimals to get its user representation).
mintNativeToken.description: IRC30 optional parameter: The human-readable description of the token.
mintNativeToken.url: IRC30 optional parameter: URL pointing to more resources about the token like a website or social media page.
mintNativeToken.logoUrl: IRC30 optional parameter: URL pointing to an image resource of the token logo.

mintNftForm.collectionId: Optional parameter: UTXO string of the collection NFT that minted this NFT
mintNftForm.royalties: Optional parameter: An object containing key-value pairs of addresses that map to payout percentages
mintNftForm.issuerName: Optional parameter: The name of the creator
mintNftForm.description: Optional parameter: A description of the NFT
mintNftForm.attributes: Optional parameter: An array of traits and values that define attributes of the NFT
mintNftForm.uri: To create a URI using custom media, first upload your file to IPFS via a storage service (e.g. https://nft.storage/)
mintNftForm.quantity: Optional parameter: The quantity of copies minted with this metadata.
